block.gaiacore.lucent_gaia_core_analyze_: §eLucent§r §5Gaia Cores§rs will spawn copper, iron and redstone ore on the sky-facing side when all other sides are occupied by glowstones. The sky-facing side has to be exposed to sunlight. In order to mine the block, it first has to be weakened by an explosive event near the core.
block.gaiacore.volcanic_gaia_core_analyz: §cVolcanic§r §5Gaia Cores§rs will spawn lava on the ground-facing side, when the sky-facing side is occupied by lava and a hostile entity is killed in that lava. In order to mine the block, it first has to be weakened by an explosive event near the core.
block.gaiacore.verdant_gaia_core_analyze: §2Verdant§r §5Gaia Cores§rs will spawn an Oak Tree on the sky-facing side when a plank and a stick is thrown on it. In order to mine the block, it first has to be weakened by an explosive event near the core.
block.gaiacore.charred_gaia_core_analyze: §8Charred§r §5Gaia Cores§rs will turn animals into coal. In order to mine the block, it has first to be weakened by an explosive event near the core.
block.gaiacore.adamant_gaia_core_analyze: §3Adamant§r §5Gaia Cores§rs turns coal into diamonds. A Creeper will spawn for each coal converted. If there are 10 creepers within a 5 block radius of the core, a big explosion will occur. In order to mine the block, it has first to be weakened by an explosive event near the core.
block.gaiacore.gaia_core_scanner_insert_: Insert a §3Gaia Scanner§r with a scanned §5Gaia Core§r in the slot to the left.
block.gaiacore.gaia_core_scanner_invalid: Item is not a §3Gaia Scanner§r or the scanner does not have a §5Gaia Core§r scanned
tooltip.gaiacore.gaia_scanner: Right-clicking a §5Gaia Core§r with the scanner will store information about that core which can be analyzed in a §lGaia Core Analyzer§r
